testcase.name: Select-Text Feature - End-to-End Tests › Text Selection Detection › should detect valid text selection (>= 10 characters)
Select-Text Feature - End-to-End Tests › Text Selection Detection › should show warning for short selection (1-9 characters)
Select-Text Feature - End-to-End Tests › Text Selection Detection › should not show button for empty selection
Select-Text Feature - End-to-End Tests › Text Selection Detection › should update button visibility when selection changes
Select-Text Feature - End-to-End Tests › UI Validation Rules (FR-007a) › should accept selection >= 10 characters and enable submit
Select-Text Feature - End-to-End Tests › UI Validation Rules (FR-007a) › should warn user for selection 1-9 characters
Select-Text Feature - End-to-End Tests › UI Validation Rules (FR-007a) › should reject empty selection silently
Select-Text Feature - End-to-End Tests › Chat Widget Integration with Selected Text › should open chat widget with selected text mode (FR-007a)
Select-Text Feature - End-to-End Tests › Chat Widget Integration with Selected Text › should submit query with selected text context to backend
Select-Text Feature - End-to-End Tests › Chat Widget Integration with Selected Text › should display response with selected text attribution
Select-Text Feature - End-to-End Tests › Backend Validation (FR-007a HTTP 400) › should handle HTTP 400 error when selected_text < 10 characters
Select-Text Feature - End-to-End Tests › Backend Validation (FR-007a HTTP 400) › should handle HTTP 400 error when selected_text is empty/null
Select-Text Feature - End-to-End Tests › Backend Validation (FR-007a HTTP 400) › should retry after handling validation error
Select-Text Feature - End-to-End Tests › Zero-Leakage Validation › should not include content outside selected passage in response
Select-Text Feature - End-to-End Tests › Zero-Leakage Validation › should query backend with selected-text mode filter
Select-Text Feature - End-to-End Tests › Message History and Context › should display selected text context in chat header
Select-Text Feature - End-to-End Tests › Message History and Context › should maintain selected text context across multiple queries
Select-Text Feature - End-to-End Tests › Message History and Context › should store message history in localStorage
Select-Text Feature - End-to-End Tests › Cross-Browser Compatibility › should work in multiple browsers
